mapper.select: SELECT comment_uid , TO_CHAR(content) AS content , write_date , modify_date , deleteyn , parent_comment_uid , user_uid , post_uid FROM comment_tb WHERE comment_uid = #{comment_uid} AND deleteyn = 'N'

SELECT c.comment_uid AS COMMENT_UID , c.parent_comment_uid AS PARENT_COMMENT_UID , (LEVEL - 1) AS DEPTH /* LEVEL을 depth로 변환 */ , u.username AS USERNAME , u.user_uid AS USER_UID , TO_CHAR(c.write_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WRITE_DATE , c.deleteyn AS DELETEYN , CASE WHEN c.deleteyn = 'Y' THEN '삭제된 댓글입니다.' ELSE TO_CHAR(c.content) END AS CONTENT FROM comment_tb c JOIN user_tb u ON c.user_uid = u.user_uid WHERE c.post_uid = #{post_uid} START WITH c.parent_comment_uid IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR c.comment_uid = c.parent_comment_uid ORDER SIBLINGS BY c.write_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_tb WHERE parent_comment_uid = #{comment_uid} AND deleteyn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_tb WHERE post_uid = #{post_uid} AND deleteyn = 'N'
